sql_queries: SELECT id, name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
INSERT INTO employees (id, name, department) VALUES (201, 'Alice', 'Finance')
UPDATE employees SET salary = salary + 5000 WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT department, AVG(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT id, name FROM employees WHERE salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance')
SELECT id, name FROM employees LIMIT 5
SELECT e.id, e.name, d.name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.id
SELECT department, MAX(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department
ALTER TABLE employees ADD COLUMN hire_date DATE
